title: Localization
description: Learn how to manage multiple languages and translate your visual novel

steps.title: Localization Panel
steps.content: The Localization panel helps you manage translations for all text in your project.

steps.title: String Table
steps.content: All translatable strings appear here. Each row shows the key, source text, and translations for each language.

steps.title: Search & Filter
steps.content: Use the search bar to find specific strings. Filter by status to show only missing translations.

steps.title: Missing Translations
steps.content: Click here to show only strings that are missing translations. This helps prioritize translation work.

steps.title: Export & Import
steps.content: Export strings to CSV or XLIFF for external translation. Import completed translations back into the project.

steps.title: Add Languages
steps.content: Click here to add a new target language. You can add as many languages as needed.
